mapper.select: SELECT a.*,zj.`ELIGIBLE` AS zjEligible,jl.`ELIGIBLE` AS jlEligible, jf.`ELIGIBLE` AS jfEligible,yf.`ELIGIBLE` AS yfEligible,qt.`ELIGIBLE` AS qtEligible FROM ${diTableName} a LEFT JOIN ${adiTableName} zj ON a.`ID`=zj.`DOMINANT_ITEM_ID` AND zj.`ACCEPTANCE_BATCH_ID`=#{zjBantchId} LEFT JOIN ${adiTableName} jl ON a.`ID`=jl.`DOMINANT_ITEM_ID` AND jl.`ACCEPTANCE_BATCH_ID`=#{jlBantchId} LEFT JOIN ${adiTableName} jf ON a.`ID`=jf.`DOMINANT_ITEM_ID` AND jf.`ACCEPTANCE_BATCH_ID`=#{jfBantchId} LEFT JOIN ${adiTableName} yf ON a.`ID`=yf.`DOMINANT_ITEM_ID` AND yf.`ACCEPTANCE_BATCH_ID`=#{yfBantchId} LEFT JOIN ${adiTableName} qt ON a.`ID`=qt.`DOMINANT_ITEM_ID` AND qt.`ACCEPTANCE_BATCH_ID`=#{qtBantchId} WHERE a.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND a.`PROCEDURE_ID`=#{procedureId} ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.ITEM_CODE,'.',1) AS SIGNED) ASC
